xxl.core.io.converters

Class FixedSizeConverter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.io.converters.Converter<T>
      • xxl.core.io.converters.SizeConverter<T>
        • xxl.core.io.converters.FixedSizeConverter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the object that can be converted by using this converter.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanConverter, ByteConverter, CharacterConverter, DateConverter, DoubleConverter, FixedSizeStringConverter, FloatConverter, IntegerConverter, LongConverter, ShortConverter, TimeConverter, TimestampConverter

    public abstract class FixedSizeConverter<T>
extends SizeConverter<T>
    This abstract class is a special kind of converter which serializes each object to the same number of bytes. This class has the additional method getSize which has to be implemented by subclasses.
    See Also:
    Converter, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FixedSizeConverter(int size)
      Constructs a converter which always converts its objects to size bytes.

    • Method Detail

      • getSerializedSize

        public int getSerializedSize()
        Returns the number of bytes used for serialization/deserialization. Each object must be serialized to the same number of bytes.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes.

      • getSerializedSize

        public int getSerializedSize(T o)
        Returns the number of bytes used for serialization/deserialization of a special object.
        Overrides:
        getSerializedSize in class SizeConverter<T>
        Parameters:
        o - the object.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes.
